params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.policy
params.description: Required. The policy to update. To prevent conflicting updates, the etag value must match the value that is stored in IAM. If the etag values do not match, the request fails with a 409 error code and ABORTED status.

methods.name: getPolicy
methods.description:
Required. The policy to update.

To prevent conflicting updates, the etag value must match the value that is stored in IAM. If the etag values do not match, the request fails with a 409 error code and ABORTED status.

Generated from protobuf field .google.iam.v2.Policy policy = 1 [(.google.api.field_behavior) = REQUIRED];
